title: Researchers predict 1.4 million deaths from all cancers in 2019 in the EU

title_detail.value: Researchers predict 1.4 million deaths from all cancers in 2019 in the EU

summary: Death rates from breast cancer are predicted to fall in all European Union (EU) countries in 2019 with the exception of Poland, according to new research.

summary_detail.value: Death rates from breast cancer are predicted to fall in all European Union (EU) countries in 2019 with the exception of Poland, according to new research.
